meanings.sent1: The cat tried to overleap the fence to catch the bird.
meanings.sent2: The athlete managed to overleap the hurdle effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo decided to overleap the river by jumping over it.
meanings.sent4: Her determination allowed her to overleap all obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's ability to overleap tall buildings amazed everyone.

meanings.definition: To surpass or exceed in leaping
meanings.sent1: The frog could overleap all the others in the pond.
meanings.sent2: His long jump record overleaps that of any other athlete.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit's attempt to overleap the competition was successful.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm to learn overleaps that of her classmates.
meanings.sent5: The cheetah's speed allows it to overleap its prey effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: Please do not overleap any important details in your report.
meanings.sent2: He tends to overleap the rules when he is in a hurry.
meanings.sent3: The student tried to overleap the boring parts of the lecture.
meanings.sent4: She tends to overleap the negative comments and focus on the positive.
meanings.sent5: It is not wise to overleap safety precautions when handling chemicals.
